## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (abf4ac32d4bbbf2bca51efed2166f670c707230f7da2b87c1318cbe8ca9dade1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'parallel-workers' @ 99.99.101 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
